title: We Test Tommy's Useless Trivia Skills
description:
For those new to The Bert Show, we have a fun fact for you: Tommy, our show director is the King of pop culture trivia. He knows almost everything about everyone in pop culture and today in the studio The Bert Show put him to the test to see how much Tommy truly knows.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: Pionaire Podcasting
